meanings.definition: A Western movie or television show.
meanings.sent1: I watched an exciting oater last night with cowboys and horses.
meanings.sent2: The classic oater featured a showdown at high noon.
meanings.sent3: The oater had so many cowboy hats, it looked like a hat store on screen!
meanings.sent4: The oater painted a vivid picture of life in the Wild West.
meanings.sent5: The dusty town in the oater felt so real, I could almost smell the gun smoke.

meanings.definition: A person who operates a machine or device.
meanings.sent1: The skilled oater fixed the broken engine in no time.
meanings.sent2: The factory manager hired a new oater to work on the assembly line.
meanings.sent3: The oater pressed all the buttons on the control panel at once by mistake!
meanings.sent4: She was a true oater, smoothly handling the complex machinery.
meanings.sent5: The oater's precision with the equipment was truly impressive.
